SO101 ROS2 Documentation
========================

Welcome to the documentation for the SO101 ROS2. This project provides
an open-source ROS 2 bridge for the Lerobot SO101 manipulator.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   overview
   installation
   setup
   bringup
   ros2controlarch
   teleop
   datacollection
